Cathy Hopkins (born in Manchester) is an English author with over 70 published titles. She has recently been writing for the popular fiction market with The Kicking The Bucket List  published in March 2017 by HarperCollins Dancing Over The Hill in January 2018 and Blast From the Past which was published in February 2019. Her latest book, A Vintage Friendship was published as an e book in August 2020, the paperback to follow in February, 2021.
